StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetDailyReportAc.vityObjec.vesDistrict]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Organiza.onID int, @FiscalYear int, @Month int AS
SELECT RS.ORGANIZATION_ID, COALESCE(AO.CONTRACT_OBJECTIVE, 0) AS CONTRACT_OBJECTIVE, --- dbo.GetContractObjec.ve (RSS.ORGANIZATION_ID, @FiscalYear, @Month, RSS.ORGANIZATION_TYPE) AS CONTRACT_OBJECTIVE, COALESCE(AO.NWAS_OBJECTIVE, 0) AS NWAS_OBJECTIVE, COALESCE(AO.INTERVIEWS_OBJECTIVE, 0) AS INTERVIEWS_OBJECTIVE FROM RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION RS INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP DISTRICT ON (RS.ORGANIZATION_ID = DISTRICT.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID AND DISTRICT.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = @Organiza.onID AND RS.ORGANIZATION_TYPE = 'RS' AND RS.ISOPEN = 'Y') LEFT OUTER JOIN ACTIVITY_OBJECTIVE AO ON (RS.ORGANIZATION_ID = AO.ORGANIZATION_ID AND AO.FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND AO.MONTH = @Month) ORDER BY RS.NAME
